title: Lands in Hambantota District
details:
***TANGALLE***

The lands with 10 perches(x500+ units).

A land is with 10 perches.(see photos) .Can get 10 teak trees also.

If you pay the full payment the price will be Rs. 700 000.00 = 10perches



OR

Down Payment = Rs. 160 000.00
Installments = Rs. 10 848.00 X 59
Hambantota is the Next developing city in Sri Lanka

*********************

***MATTALA***(near the Airport)

1 acre lands(x12+units) near the Mattala Airport(1km to airport) =Rs. 5 200 000.00(1 acre)
